text: nim'ma mateyarannu, nim'ma putriyarannu, nim'ma sahodariyarannu, nim'ma tandeya sahodariyarannu, nim'ma tayiya sahodariyarannu, nim'ma sahodarara putriyarannu, nim'ma sahodariyara putriyarannu, nimage halunisidda nim'ma mateyarannu, nim'ma jote halunda (karanakkagi) nim'ma sahodariyaradavarannu, nim'ma patniyara mateyarannu mattu nivu sambhogisiruvantaha nim'ma patniyaru hetta mattu nim'ma posaneyalliruva nim'ma mala putriyarannu (vivahavaguvudannu) nim'ma palige nisedhisalagide â€“ nivu a patniyara jote sambhogisillavadare (avarannu bittu avara a putriyarannu vivahavaguvudakke) aksepavilla. Hageye nim'ma svanta putrara patniyaragiddavaru (nimage nisid'dharagiddare). Mattu ekakaladalli ibbaru sahodariyarannu nivu vivahavaguvudu (nisid'dhavagide) â€“ i hinde nadedu hogiruvudara horatu. Khanditavagiyu allahanu ksamasilanu karunamayiyu agiddane
